verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor [A] Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; of David בְּ֝בָרְח֗וֹ <S%H1272><s%> be-va-re-Cho, when he fled מִפְּנֵ֤י׀ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from אַבְשָׁל֬וֹם <S%H53><s%> av-sha-Lom Absalom בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- how רַבּ֣וּ <S%H7231><s%> rab-Bu how are they increased צָרָ֑י <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rai; that trouble רַ֝בִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, me many קָמִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> ka-Mim [are] they that rise up עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. against

רַבִּים֮ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim Many אֹמְרִ֪ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim [there be] which say לְנַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> le-Naf-Shi of my soul אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There יְֽשׁוּעָ֓תָה <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'A-tah [There is] no help לּ֬וֹ lo בֵֽאלֹהִ֬ים <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Him for him in God סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah O יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh But thou O LORD מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen [art] a shield בַּעֲדִ֑י <S%H1157><s%> ba-'a-Di; about כְּ֝בוֹדִ֗י <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Di, for me my glory וּמֵרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> u-me-Rim and the lifter up רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi. of mine head

ק֭וֹלִי <S%H6963><s%> Ko-li with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> 'ek-Ra; I cried וַיַּֽעֲנֵ֨נִי <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Ne-ni and he heard מֵהַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> me-Har hill קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho me out of his holy סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I שָׁכַ֗בְתִּי <S%H7901><s%> sha-Chav-ti, I laid me down וָֽאִ֫ישָׁ֥נָה <S%H3462><s%> va-'I-Sha-nah and slept הֱקִיצ֑וֹתִי <S%H6974><s%> he-ki-Tzo-ti; I awaked כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD יִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5564><s%> yis-me-Che-ni. sustained

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> 'I-ra I will not be afraid מֵרִבְב֥וֹת <S%H7233><s%> me-riv-Vot of ten thousands עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> 'Am; of people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who סָ֝בִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, [themselves] against me round about שָׁ֣תוּ <S%H7896><s%> Sha-tu that have set עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. against

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <S%H6965><s%> ku-Mah Arise יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD הוֹשִׁ֘יעֵ֤נִי <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'E-ni save אֱלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, me O my God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִכִּ֣יתָ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ki-ta for thou hast smitten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai all mine enemies לֶ֑חִי <S%H3895><s%> Le-chi; [upon] the cheek bone שִׁנֵּ֖י <S%H8127><s%> shin-Nei the teeth רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the ungodly שִׁבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H7665><s%> shib-Bar-ta. thou hast broken

לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [belongeth] unto the LORD הַיְשׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H3444><s%> hay-shu-'Ah; Salvation עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha [is] upon thy people בִרְכָתֶ֣ךָ <S%H1293><s%> vir-cha-Te-cha thy blessing סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah
